description: An agreement represents the standard terms agreed between two parties.
title: Agreement Schema

___version_id.description: The version identifier of the data such as the firm's internal batch identifier.

___start_date.description: The timestamp that the agreement commences. YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ in accordance with ISO 8601.

___type.description: The type of the master agreement.

$eref.description: Two-letter country code as defined according to ISO 3166-1 plus ISO allowed, user-assignable codes (AA, QM to QZ, XA to XZ, and ZZ).

___country_code.description: The country code for the governing law of the agreement. Two-letter country code as defined according to ISO 3166-1.

___customer_id.description: The unique identifier used by the financial institution to identify the counterparty to this agreement.

___date.description: The observation or value date for the data in this object. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ in accordance with ISO 8601.

___credit_support_type.description: The type of credit support document

___stay_protocol.description: Indicates whether a stay protocol has been signed by one or both parties to the agreement.

___id.description: The unique identifier for the agreement within the financial institution.

___source.description: The source where this data originated.
